official_title: To authorize the continued operation of Jordon Hot Springs in the Golden Trout Wilderness, Inyo National Forest, California.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to provide for the operation and maintenance of commercial services by private persons at Jordan Hot Springs in Golden Trout Wilderness, Inyo National Forest, California.

titles.title: To authorize the continued operation of Jordon Hot Springs in the Golden Trout Wilderness, Inyo National Forest, California.
